posts.author: ashflash69
posts.content:
Greetings and well met,

I am interested in hosting (full dedicated server) & part-time Dming a PW. Not sure how active this forum still is but couldn't find a more appropriate place for this.

If you have a PW module collecting dust in your vault we could ressurect together, are currently working on a world and require a host/Dm or indeed would be interested in creating a team to get a project off the ground, then step forth!

Ash

posts.author: Cornflower
posts.content: Er.... I might be looking for a new tech partner for our team. You still out there?

posts.author: ADW
posts.content:
Cornflower wrote: Er.... I might be looking for a new tech partner for our team. You still out there?
I'm intrigued! What do you have in mind?

posts.author: Cornflower
posts.content:
Our current tech guy is awesome, but has something called "life" that gets in the way sometime. So, depending on what happens, we either need a backup tech guy or a new tech guy.
We're currently rebuilding Glorwing (which once was no 4 on Bioware's best PW list) on the new tech available. Most adventure areas are done, but we have a few wrinkles in the "between mod and server" area.
If you are interested, first check out www.glorwing.com for some history, then www.nwee.glorwing.com for some new information. If you're still interested let me know and I'll give you access to our Discord.
